title: Lucid Launcher Pro v1 32.apk
description:
Lucid Launcher Pro unlocks various features for Lucid Launcher. It will also receive updates 1 day before the free version. If you want to request a feature and you bought Pro please request at our Google+ page or Contact us and leave your email.

Pro Version Unlocks:
*Updates 1 Day Earlier Than Free Version
*Custom Search Text (Look at screenshots)
*Sidebar transparency options
*Ability to hide app label in favorites bar
*More Page Transition Animations
*Vertical Page Transitions (5th Screenshot)
*More Home Pages
*Sidebar Themes (More coming soon)
*Editable Icon Size In Sidebar, Home Page, and App Drawer
*Prioritized Feature Request Implementations VIA Google+

WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s New
*Ability to set the percentage of zoom to the background when pulling out sidebar
*when adding widgets, widgets should be sized correctly
*all crash reports have been reviewed and taken care of to the best ability
*home screen vertical paging should no longer lag
*new font for bookmarks
*ability to disable browser (reduces memory significantly which should be good for slower phones)
*ability to hide Searchbar on home page
*icon theme memory optimization
*german language added
*turkish language
